other_tests.findings: Dermal fibrosis with thickened collagen bundles and increased mucin and fibroblasts consistent with cutis verticis gyrata.
Histologic results revealed a spindle cell tumor measuring 20.0 cm in the maximal dimension, involving 90% of the lung parenchyma.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 1-month follow-up, the patient became euglycemic and pachydermoid skin changes had significantly improved; seborrhea had resolved and digital clubbing was reduced.
